title: Ultrathin business card runs a fluid simulation

aiHeadline: Because regular business cards just aren't enough, here's one that simulates fluid dynamics while you hand it out.

title: Linear sent me down a local-first rabbit hole
author: jcusch
aiHeadline: Linear sent this developer on a wild goose chase, and now they're knee-deep in local-first architecture. Who knew collaboration software could be so... adventurous?

title: Jim Lovell, Apollo 13 commander, has died
author: LorenDB
aiHeadline: Apollo 13's commander, Jim Lovell, has passed away, leaving the world to wonder, 'What's the next giant leap for mankind?' RIP, Captain Lovell.

title: The surprise deprecation of GPT-4o for ChatGPT consumers
author: tosh
aiHeadline: ChatGPT users are in for a shock as GPT-4o gets the boot, and no one saw it coming. Because nothing says 'we care about your workflow' like a surprise deprecation notice.
